meanings: (반드시, 틀림없이) surely, certainly, undoubtedly, (무슨 수를 써서라도) at any cost
be as like as two peas

vlive.korean: 다음에 꼭 해줄게~ I will do it next time. 듣기 View video VICTON : 월요일밤!!병찬이랑
vlive.english: I will do it next time.

vlive.korean: 이따가 꼭 찍어야지! Later...I will take a photo there! 듣기 View video TWICE : 나연 TV “나연이 하와이 갔나연? (Feat. 코스모폴리탄 3월호)” EP.03

vlive.korean: 목도리도 꼭 하고 진짜 따뜻하게 다녀요 알았죠? Make sure you wear scarves and dress warmly, okay? 듣기 View video ITZY : 🖤
vlive.english: Make sure you wear scarves and dress warmly, okay?

vlive.korean: 하트 그리고 여기 밑에 메시지도 적었습니다 '꼭 이루자' - 나 보이냐 이거? 보이지? A heart and a message below, "Achieve it". - Do you see this? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
